Review.Titre: So far it is easy to work with

I recently started using the PDF Extra app and I must say, it has quickly become an essential tool for my work. The app offers a wide range of features that make working with PDFs a breeze. I can easily edit and annotate my documents, add signatures, and even convert PDFs to other formats. The app's user interface is intuitive and easy to navigate, making it simple to find and use the features I need. Additionally, the app is fast and responsive, which means I can get my work done quickly and efficiently. Overall, I highly recommend the PDF Extra app to anyone who regularly works with PDFs.
Just recently purchased PDF Extra, easy to download and activate, then sign up via email.Need to use software more before I can given a full 5 star.

Review.Titre: This is a good PDF Editor
Review.Contenu: I love the easy editability for pdf's.  To create pdf forms, adding notes to pdf's.  The only reason I didn't give five stars is that to convert from pdf to a "read aloud" pdf I have to constantly look up how to create it.I hope that PDF Extra will be able to create a tab specifically to create Read Aloud content. Other than that, PDF Extra is a great software and on par with Adobe Acrobat Pro, in my opinion.  My biggest hiccup is not being able to create Read Aloud pdf's.

I wrote to Pdf Extra's billing team and asked for a refund, they asked to do some troubleshooting. When I wrote back that we would rather have refuns, they promptly refunded. 4 stars for excellent customer service.
